title: Eiffel Tower Light Show
context: The Eiffel Tower has a nightly light show that begins after sunset and runs every hour on the hour until 1 a.m.
question: When does the Eiffel Tower's nightly light show occur?

text: After sunset every hour on the hour

title: Morning Prayers
context: Morning prayers in many monasteries begin at the first light of dawn, following a tradition that spans centuries.
question: When do morning prayers begin?

text: At the first light of dawn

title: Harvest Festival
context: The annual harvest festival is celebrated when the crops are fully harvested, marking the end of the agricultural season.
question: When is the harvest festival celebrated?

text: When the crops are fully harvested

title: Meteor Shower
context: The meteor shower is best observed late at night, once the skies are dark and clear.
question: When is the meteor shower best observed?

text: Late at night when the skies are dark

title: High Tide Observation
context: The high tide observation on coastal beaches occurs when the tide reaches its peak, drawing crowds to witness the phenomenon.
question: When does the high tide observation occur?

text: When the tide reaches its peak

title: Hurricane Preparation
context: Residents begin hurricane preparations as soon as a hurricane warning is issued by local authorities.
question: When do residents begin hurricane preparations?

text: As soon as a hurricane warning is issued

title: First Snowfall Celebration
context: Communities in the region celebrate the first snowfall of the season, marking the beginning of winter festivities.
question: When is the first snowfall celebrated?

text: At the first snowfall of the season

title: Bird Migration
context: Bird migration typically occurs at dawn, as flocks take advantage of calm winds and cooler temperatures.
question: When does bird migration typically occur?

text: At dawn

title: School Fire Drills
context: School fire drills are scheduled during regular school hours to ensure all students participate.
question: When are school fire drills scheduled?

text: During regular school hours

title: Concert Intermission
context: The intermission in most concerts occurs halfway through the performance, giving attendees a break.
question: When does the concert intermission occur?

text: Halfway through the performance

title: Tea Harvesting
context: Tea leaves are plucked during the early morning hours, as the dew keeps them fresh and aromatic.
question: When are tea leaves harvested?

text: During the early morning hours

title: Wildlife Safari
context: Wildlife safaris are best conducted at sunrise, when animals are most active and visible.
question: When is the best time for a wildlife safari?

text: At sunrise

title: Evening Prayer Call
context: The evening prayer call is announced just before sunset, signaling the time for worship.
question: When is the evening prayer call announced?

text: Just before sunset

title: Wedding Procession
context: The wedding procession begins immediately after the bride and groom have completed the vows.
question: When does the wedding procession begin?

text: Immediately after the vows

title: Autumn Leaf Watching
context: Autumn leaf watching peaks when the leaves have fully changed color and the weather is crisp.
question: When does autumn leaf watching peak?

text: When the leaves have fully changed color

title: Circus Show Finale
context: The circus show finale takes place at the end of the performance, featuring all performers on stage.
question: When does the circus show finale take place?

text: At the end of the performance

title: Volcanic Eruption Monitoring
context: Volcanic eruptions are monitored closely during periods of heightened seismic activity.
question: When are volcanic eruptions monitored closely?

text: During periods of heightened seismic activity

title: Library Quiet Time
context: Libraries enforce quiet time after school hours, to accommodate students studying.
question: When is library quiet time enforced?

text: After school hours

title: Star Gazing
context: Star gazing is best done on a cloudless night, away from city lights.
question: When is star gazing best done?

text: On a cloudless night

title: New Year's Countdown
context: The New Year's countdown begins at the stroke of midnight, with celebrations following.
question: When does the New Year's countdown begin?

text: At the stroke of midnight
